Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
controller.account.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
Manages user accounts, including login, registration, password changes, and loading user data.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountManager

      public AccountManager()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static User login(UserType userType, String userID, String password) throws PasswordIncorrectException, ModelNotFoundException
      Attempts to log in a user with the given credentials.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of the user trying to log in.
      userID - The ID of the user.
      password - The password provided by the user.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object.
      Throws:
      PasswordIncorrectException - If the provided password does not match the stored password.
      ModelNotFoundException - If no user with the given ID and type exists.

    • changePassword

      public static void changePassword(UserType userType, String userID, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws PasswordIncorrectException, ModelNotFoundException
      Changes the password for a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of the user.
      userID - The ID of the user.
      oldPassword - The user's current password.
      newPassword - The desired new password.
      Throws:
      PasswordIncorrectException - If the provided old password does not match.
      ModelNotFoundException - If no user with the given ID and type exists.

    • getUsersByNRIC

      public static List<User> getUsersByNRIC(String userNRIC)
      Retrieves a list of all users (Applicants, Managers, Officers) matching the given NRIC.
      Parameters:
      userNRIC - The NRIC to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects matching the NRIC. Returns an empty list if no matches are found.

    • register

      public static User register(UserType userType, String userNRIC, String password, String name, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, String projectID, RoomType roomType) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Registers a new user in the system with full details including password.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of user to register.
      userNRIC - The NRIC of the new user (used as ID).
      password - The password for the new user.
      name - The name of the new user.
      age - The age of the new user.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the new user.
      projectID - The project ID associated with the user (if applicable).
      roomType - The room type associated with the user (if applicable).
      Returns:
      The newly created User object.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If a user with the same NRIC (ID) already exists.

    • register

      public static User register(UserType userType, String userNRIC, String name, Integer age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, String projectID, RoomType roomType) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Registers a new user in the system with a default password "password". Use this when the specific password is not immediately required or will be set later.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of user to register.
      userNRIC - The NRIC of the new user (used as ID).
      name - The name of the new user.
      age - The age of the new user.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the new user.
      projectID - The project ID associated with the user (if applicable).
      roomType - The room type associated with the user (if applicable).
      Returns:
      The newly created User object.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If a user with the same NRIC (ID) already exists.

    • loadUsers

      public static void loadUsers()
      Loads initial user data from CSV files for Applicants, Managers, and Officers. This is typically called on the first start of the application.

    • repositoryIsEmpty

      public static boolean repositoryIsEmpty()
      Checks if all user repositories (Applicant, Manager, Officer) are empty.
      Returns:
      true if all repositories are empty, false otherwise.

    • getByDomainAndID

      public static User getByDomainAndID(UserType userType, String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Retrieves a specific user by their type and ID.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of the user to retrieve.
      ID - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object matching the type and ID.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no user with the specified type and ID is found.
